458310.name: CS:GO Player Profiles: Friberg - Ninjas in Pyjamas
458310.description: The best players are not made overnight. Being the best of the best in CS:GO takes tremendous dedication and skill. This continuing collection of interviews takes you around the world and inside the lives of the CS:GO elite, offering an in depth look at the stories behind the players that are shaping the scene today.
458310.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
